name: Bladdar Meater
description:
Demonic profanity comes pouring through the window, you are your three new friends escape the mental hospital running from the crude demon jackholes. Y'all find a cabin in trhe woods down the road and start fortifying and preparing for whatever comes next. Bladder Meater is a funny horror strategy/survival FPS starring the Heretics of Mental island. See how many days you can last as the 4 mentally ill friends fortifing, scavanging and shooting to survive.

P.S. We are still in prototype phase
